title: Don’t let the virus invade your mind
description: India News: Social-distancing to stop Covid-19 will leave many of us feeling lonely and anxious, leading to an epidemic of psychological health issues
content: Goodbye, ‘normal’. If social-distancing becomes a recurring compulsion (see story above), globetrotting, live matches, evenings with friends—all the things we love—will become a threat to human survival. “This isn’t a temporary disruption. It’s the start of a… [+1627 chars]
